meanings.definition: To inoculate with smallpox virus to produce immunity
meanings.sent1: The doctor variolates the child to protect them from smallpox.
meanings.sent2: It is important to variolate individuals in regions at risk of smallpox outbreaks.
meanings.sent3: The clown decided to variolate the circus animals to prevent a smallpox epidemic among them.
meanings.sent4: The idea of variolating the entire population against smallpox spread like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The ancient practice of variolating people against smallpox saved countless lives.
